00002 #define STATEMACHINE_H

00014 #include <typeinfo>

00016 extern "C" {
00017 #include <lua.h>
00018 #include <lauxlib.h>
00019 #include <lualib.h>
00020 }
00021 
00022 // Using LuaBridge found at https://github.com/vinniefalco/LuaBridge
00023 #include "LuaBridge.h"
00024 
00025 
00026 template <class entityType> class StateMachine
00027 {
00028 public:
00029   //----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00032   //----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00033   StateMachine(entityType* _owner):m_owner(_owner)
00034   {
00035     L = m_owner->getLuaState();
00036     registerLua(L);
00037     luabridge::push(L, this);
00038     lua_setglobal(L, "stateMachine");
00039     m_currentState = NULL;
00040     m_previousState = NULL;
00041   }
00042 
00043   //----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00045   //----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00046   ~StateMachine() {}
00047 
00048   //----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00051   //----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00052   void setCurrentState(const char* _inState) { m_currentState = _inState; }
00053   //----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00056   //----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00057   const char* getCurrentState() const { return m_currentState; }
00058   //----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00061   //----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00062   void setPreviousState(const char* _inState) { m_previousState = _inState; }
00063   //----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00066   //----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00067   const char* getPreviousState() const { return m_previousState; }
00068   //----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00071   //----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00072   void setGlobalState(const char* _inState) { m_globalState = _inState; }
00073   //----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00076   //----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00077   const char* getGlobalState() const { return m_globalState; }
00078 
00079   //----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00081   //----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00082   void update()
00083   {
00084     //check global state in lua for variable or state changes that apply to every state
00085     if (m_globalState)
00086     {
00087       luaCallState(m_globalState, "execute");
00088     }
00089 
00090     //call enter on first tick to set state behaviours
00091     if(!m_previousState && m_currentState)
00092     {
00093       luaCallState(m_currentState, "enter");
00094       m_previousState = m_currentState;
00095     }
00096 
00097     //call execute function of current state to check for variable or state changes
00098     else if (m_currentState)
00099     {
00100       luaCallState(m_currentState, "execute");
00101     }
00102 
00103     //check agent properties against limits set in lua i.e. health not rising above 100
00104     luaCallState("limits", "check");
00105   }
00106 
00107   //----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00111   //----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00112   void luaCallState(const char* _state, const char* _phase)
00113   {
00114     luabridge::LuaRef state = luabridge::getGlobal(L, _state);
00115     state[_phase]();
00116   }
00117   //----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00120   //----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00121   void changeState(const char* _newState)
00122   {
00123     m_previousState = m_currentState;
00124 
00125     //call exit function of current state
00126     if (m_currentState != NULL)
00127     {
00128       m_previousState = m_currentState;
00129       luaCallState(m_currentState, "exit");
00130     }
00131     //call enter function of new state
00132     m_currentState = _newState;
00133     luaCallState(m_currentState, "enter");
00134   }
00135 
00136   //----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00139   //----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00140   void registerLua(lua_State* _L)
00141   {
00142       luabridge::getGlobalNamespace(_L)
00143           .beginClass<StateMachine>("StateMachine")
00144                   .addFunction("changeState", &StateMachine::changeState)
00145                   .addProperty("m_currentState", &StateMachine::getCurrentState, &StateMachine::setCurrentState)
00146                   .addProperty("m_previousState", &StateMachine::getPreviousState, &StateMachine::setPreviousState)
00147                   .addProperty("m_globalState", &StateMachine::getGlobalState, &StateMachine::setGlobalState)
00148 
00149           .endClass();
00150   }
00151 
00152 
00153 private:
00154   //----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00156   //----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00157   entityType* m_owner;
00158   //----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00160   //----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00161   const char* m_currentState;
00162   //----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00164   //----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00165   const char* m_previousState;
00166   //----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00168   //----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00169   const char* m_globalState;
00170   //----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00172   //----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00173   lua_State *L;
00174 };
00175 
00176 #endif // STATEMACHINE_H
